Package com.atakmap.android.maps

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.maps.FilterMetaDataHolder
      • com.atakmap.android.maps.MapItem
        • com.atakmap.android.maps.Shape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    URIContent, HashtagContent, Capturable, MetaDataHolder, MetaDataHolder2, VisibilityListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Arrow, Association, AutoSizeAngleOverlayShape, DrawingCircle, DrawingEllipse, FahArrowWidget.Item, ImageOverlay, MetaShape, Polyline, SensorFOV
    public abstract class Shape
extends MapItem
implements Capturable
    Abstract base for any MapItem with shape-like properties
    See Also:
    Ellipse

      • getArea

        public double getArea()

        Returns:
